original_title: Redwood Justin: Vampire Hunter: Dance with a Vampire
overview: Follow the story of Redwood Justin, who is determined to rescue his sister from the vampires that kidnapped her years ago. Bolt Upright has the skills and knowledge necessary to fight the vampires and takes Redwood on a whirlwind journey that takes them right into to vampires' den.
title: Redwood Justin: Vampire Hunter: Dance with a Vampire
